meanings.definition: Of or relating to a valve.
meanings.sent1: The valvar mechanism ensures proper flow of fluids.
meanings.sent2: The heart has a valvar structure to regulate blood circulation.
meanings.sent3: The valvar door squeaked like a mouse every time it opened.
meanings.sent4: Her valvar decision-making process was as precise as a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The valvar nature of the system made it efficient and reliable.

meanings.sent1: The valvar pipes controlled the water flow in the irrigation system.
meanings.sent2: The engine had a valvar setup for optimal performance.
meanings.sent3: The valvar bicycle tire kept losing air, causing comical wobbles.
meanings.sent4: His valvar communication style allowed him to filter information effectively.
meanings.sent5: The valvar design of the lock prevented any leaks or malfunctions.
